articles.title: Camila Cabello Gets Edgy in Fishnets, Hot Pants and Thigh-High Boots on ‘Saturday Night Live’ - Footwear News
articles.description: Cabello wore a sleek leather outfit and hot pants over fishnets, each with platform boots, for her 'Saturday Night Live' performance.
articles.content:
Camila Cabello went dark for her latest performance on “Saturday Night Live” last night.
The former Fifth Harmony member began her set with her song “Bam Bam” off of her new album “Familia.” For the… [+2882 chars]

articles.description: In another universe, Jake Gyllenhaal could have been an all-time best cast member.
